item.title: Prime Meridian Holding Co 10-K
item.description: Prime Meridian Holding Co, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 10, 2022 had 35453 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: bank - 451 instances loans - 443 instances company - 361 instances interest - 302 instances loan - 301 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
